column4: : installled the ATI drivers and now i can launch X, but in failsafe terminal mode only
X works only in failsafe terminal, otherwise "caught signal 11"
using the fglrx and the kernel you told me to use
you had the athlon? you're making progress. signall 11 is much better news
good to hear it's good news :)
signal 11 is often a sign of bad ram
i don't get that with hoary and xp works perfectly
linux is more picky about ram

you told me to install the smp kernel, to change to flgrx and to change the permissions of .ICEauthority :D
